item.title: MERCURY GENERAL CORP 10-K
item.description: MERCURY GENERAL CORP, which is in the Fire, Marine & Casualty Insurance [6331] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 14, 2023 had 37906 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 1084 instances 2022 - 413 instances insurance - 402 instances 31 - 337 instances financial - 331 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
